info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Garfield and central Rio Blanco Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 215 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Meeker, or 33 miles northwest of Glenwood Springs, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Garfield and central Rio Blanco Counties. This includes Colorado 13 between mile markers 18 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
